title: Hospitals and everything like that
brief_description: Designed to allay children’s fears of the hospitalisation process. Follows a young girl suffering from an asthmatic complaint as she checks into the hospital and is given routine check-ups and special tests. Shows the sympathetic and supportive nature of the hospital staff. Suitable for upper primary level.
